assessment_steps.extracted_paper_info: The study aims to evaluate the functional impact of the EGFR L858R mutation on the kinase activity of the protein.
assessment_steps.reasoning: The study clearly defines the disease mechanism as the impact on kinase activity.

overall_conclusion: This strength was assigned because the study uses a protein interaction assay, which is broadly accepted in the field to evaluate the effect of the EGFR L858R mutation on the interaction between EGFR and its binding partners.
